text:
@Mike_Pence Hey @VP, try peddling your rubbish to everyone living in fear of the coronavurus, those suffering from the coronavirus, and the families with loved ones they've lost to the coronavirus. It won't go over well.

You're a pathetic useless piece of shit and a stooge of Donald Trump.
